# This file is autogenerated by always_run.py
# Do not edit this file directly

ciso_ci_tammany_hall_creation_trigger = {
	always = yes
	state_region = s:STATE_NEW_YORK
}
ciso_ci_tammany_hall_is_radical = {
	OWNER = {
		OR = {
			has_law = law_type:law_censorship
			has_law = law_type:law_outlawed_dissent
		}
	}
}
ciso_ci_tammany_hall_is_loyalist = {
	OWNER = {
		has_law = law_type:law_guaranteed_liberties
	}
}
ciso_ci_tammany_hall_is_aggro = {
	ciso_ci_tammany_hall_stance > 0
}
ciso_ci_tammany_hall_is_coop = {
	ciso_ci_tammany_hall_stance < 0
}
ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_creation_trigger = {
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_creation_trigger_heavy_industry
		any_scope_building = {
			level > 5
			is_building_group = bg_heavy_industry
		}
	}
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_creation_trigger_machinists
		pop_type_percent_state = {
			target = pop_type:machinists
			value >= 0.025
		}
	}
	always = yes
}
ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_is_radical = {
	OWNER = {
		has_law = law_type:law_combination_acts
	}
}
ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_is_loyalist = {
	OWNER = {
		OR = {
			has_law = law_type:law_corporatized_unions
			has_law = law_type:law_factory_councils
		}
	}
}
ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_is_aggro = {
	ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_stance > 0
}
ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_is_coop = {
	ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_stance < 0
}
ciso_ci_royal_court_creation_trigger = {
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = ciso_ci_royal_court_creation_trigger_is_royal_capital
		is_capital = yes
		owner = {
			has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
		}
	}
	always = yes
}
ciso_ci_royal_court_is_radical = {
	always = no
}
ciso_ci_royal_court_is_loyalist = {
	always = yes
}
ciso_ci_royal_court_is_aggro = {
	ciso_ci_royal_court_stance > 0
}
ciso_ci_royal_court_is_coop = {
	ciso_ci_royal_court_stance < 0
}
ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_creation_trigger = {
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_creation_trigger_manufacturing
		any_scope_building = {
			level > 10
			is_building_group = bg_manufacturing
			private_ownership_fraction > 0.2
		}
	}
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_creation_trigger_capitalist_ratio
		pop_type_percent_state = {
			target = pop_type:capitalists
			value >= 0.0025
		}
	}
	always = yes
}
ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_is_radical = {
	OWNER = {
		has_law = law_type:law_industry_banned
	}
}
ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_is_loyalist = {
	OWNER = {
		has_law = law_type:law_laissez_faire
	}
}
ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_is_aggro = {
	ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_stance > 0
}
ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_is_coop = {
	ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_stance < 0
}
